title: [DREAMER] Replace direct console calls with structured logging

user_stories.title: Replace console calls in show and list commands
user_stories.description: Convert all console.log calls in src/commands/show.ts and src/commands/list.ts to use the structured logger.

user_stories.title: Replace console calls in phase and status commands
user_stories.description: Convert all console.log and console.warn calls in src/commands/phase.ts and src/commands/status.ts to use the structured logger.

user_stories.title: Replace console calls in doctor command and logic
user_stories.description: Convert all console calls in src/doctor.ts and src/commands/doctor.ts to use the structured logger.

user_stories.title: Audit and replace miscellaneous console calls
user_stories.description: Scan and replace console calls in src/workflow/itemWorkflow.ts and src/agent/healingRunner.ts.

user_stories.title: Verify output visibility and level control
user_stories.description: Ensure that primary CLI output remains visible by default and respects --quiet/--verbose flags.
